title: Massive Verizon Fios Outage Reported Across US East Coast, Millions Affected
content: Reports of the outages spiked between midnight and 2 am EST, with the network receiving thousands of complaints during this time, according to Down Detector.

title: Mike Waltz: The Combat Veteran Turned National Security Adviser

title: WHO Members' Pandemic Accord Talks To Spill Into 2025
content: Talks between WHO member states on a landmark global accord on handling future pandemics will roll into 2025 after countries decided Monday there were too many gaps to seal a deal this year.

title: Bees Help Tackle Elephant-Human Conflict In Kenya

title: New Antibody Treatment Boosts Immune Response Against Tumor: Study

title: Mike Waltz, India Caucus Head, To Be Trump's National Security Adviser
content: In the most significant appointment yet for India from incoming administration of President-elect Donald Trump on Monday announced Mike Waltz, a Congressman from Florida who is the co-chair of the India Caucus, as his new National Security Adviser.
summary: In the most significant appointment yet for India from incoming administration of President-elect Donald Trump on Monday announced Mike Waltz, a Congressman from Florida who is the co-chair of the India Caucus, as his new National Security Adviser.
